name: The Mobile Experience Company
tag_list: mobile-engagement, mobile-experiences, proximity-marketing, measurement, real-time-metrics, mobile-barcodes, augmented-reality, mobile-coupons
overview:
The Mobile Experience Company (Mobile X Co.) offers a suite of mobile solutions that enable agencies and clients to create, execute, and measure their engagement initiatives in real-time.

Reward consumers for spending time with your brand through new and innovative engagement mechanics – Mobile Verification Technology (coupons, vouchers, tickets), SMS and Mobile Web, Mobile Tags (QR Codes, Microsoft Tags, Snap Tags), Image Recognition (augmented reality), NFC-enabled solutions, and end-to-end data capture with our campaign management platform.
